English: That humiliating day a hundred years ago.
It's a memory that I can never forget, that I should never forget. \n
The world was dead quiet, and everything was falling apart.
Having shut ourselves off from the rest of the world, there was no one to help us.
Their blades even struck the hearts of my parents.
That day, we lost completely.
Dimael, we don't have time! We'll all get killed at this rate.
We have to move to the Fortress!
Go ahead.
I'll buy you some time.
This is too much!
We'd better get out of here with those who haven't left yet!
No! Someone has to defend the entrance to the Fortress, or the enemies will rush in as well!
Listen to me! You'll get killed!
If I'm going to die, I'm going to die with these scumbags who killed my parents!
You stubborn bastard!
Then I'm staying, too. I'm not leaving you behind.
I said, go!
You won't move a single step past me.
Ah, what a fearless man.
Your courage is impressive. I'll let you live. Step aside.
Shut your filthy mouth and just bring it on!
*Chuckle* You look like a wreck and crave for death.
The Dark Elves refuse to succumb to monsters like you.
Foolish... Don't you see that the world is about to bow down to Angmund?
You traitors turned your backs on the light and hid in the shadows.
Submit to the darkness and follow its laws.
Welcome the sight of the world being tainted by evil.
Ugh...
Stop struggling. Only death awaits you in your future.
Open the path.
Take care of Epigael.
What are you saying?
Don't tell me to run out on you. I didn't come all this way, just to do that.
This is my final wish.
I lost my parents.
I can't lose you or my sister.
But what about you!?
Please go! You're too battered to fight, anyway!
I'll take Epigael to the Fortress.
Come back in one piece.
Khhh... That's what you get for talking big.
.... Mwa hah hah! How interesting!
I didn't know there was such a strong warrior among the inferiors.
But you still lost. That doesn't change.
Shut... up...
*Chuckle* You're tenacious, I'll give you that.
I have a high regard for those who won't give up.
Like you. *Chuckle*
You're dying...
Ugh! What on earth have you done to me!?
It's my thanks to you for killing me.
You deserve this gift more than anyone else. Mwa hah hah!
*Cough, Cough*
Protect your life with that tenacity of yours.
Become the origin of a new species that will populate the world.
He'll be pleased to see what you become. Mwa hah hah!
Angmund, this is my way of carrying out your will...
You bastard!
What did you do... to...
Dimael! Dimael!
Epigael, where are you?
Help me. Help me, Dimael. It's too dark.
Epigael!
Dimael, I'm here.
Ugh... Am I dreaming...?
I'm... alive.
I'm alive—alive!
Epigael!
Your brother is alive.
Please hang in there. Please...
Lorraine, I've looked around. They got Arrovina, too.
This is bad.
The enemies are moving more quickly than we expected. We must hurry.
I'll try to hold them off, so they won't interfere with you again.
I'm worried, after seeing what's happened here. Soon the entire continent will be overrun by monsters.
The plan is to form a temporary defense line with the survivors.
I want to follow you and assist the Warrior of the Holy Sword,
but since the top priority is to save as many lives as we can... Leave this place to me.
I'll open up a path to your destination in a few days, whatever it takes.
Thank you, Princess. Let's hurry.
Err!?
Wait! Here's a survivor!
What is it now? Did Arrovina really fall?
Step aside.
We're not here to hurt you. There are some people you need to see.
Stop talking nonsense and just get out of here!
Out of my way! Epigael is the only one I need to see!
He's not listening. Has he succumbed to the darkness as well?
Tie him up before he runs away!
You scumbags, don't you dare touch me!
What's going on?
Princess, there's a Dark Elf who's still alive here!
Lorraine, there's a survivor in Arrovina.
..... Hah, even the unpleasant Elves are here!
Get out of my way before I do something unpleasant to you.
So arrogant and savage. You have no manners whatsoever, just like the rest of your kind.
We want to talk.
It's very important.
Shut up. Don't make me repeat myself.
Get out of Arrovina now!
Dark Elf, please calm down. We didn't come here to fight.
We came here to help.
Enough of your pretentious nonsense. Go back to Elidora!
Keep getting in my way, and I'll kill you all!
You impure-blooded mongrel,
how dare you speak to Lorraine like that?
Hmpf, there is nothing that your kind can say that would sway me.
I'm tired of listening to your nonsense. Maybe I should kill you all and get it over with.
Please calm down. We're not your enemies.
If you want to talk, go back home and talk to your own kind!
You'll regret shooting arrows at me.
Strange... My body feels way too light...
Wait, stop!
Lorraine, his kind doesn't deserve to live.
Once a traitor, always a traitor. We shouldn't accept him—
Princess Selene, you promised me to put aside your problems with them.
This is not the time to fight. Look at his arm.
What the hell? You say you have noble blood. Is this the best you can do?
You're pathetic.
Grr, you!
Enough.
You. You shouldn't strain yourself any further.
Hmpf, what? Don't tell me what to do.
Wait, do you really think you did that on your own?
You mongrels are never helpful.
Alright, then how do you like to be beaten up by a mongrel?
You couldn't have done that if you didn't have the power that's not your own!
Hmpf, you Elves are only good at talking, aren't you?
You make me laugh, hissing like that.
How pathetic!
What? Stupid girl!
What? You jerk violet!
ENOUGH!
Princess, stop provoking him.
I'm sorry, Lorraine. That was rude of me.
Dark Elf, you're right. We've intruded your territory, and I'd like to apologize for that.
But I had to come. I'd sent a letter to Arrovina, but there was no response at all.
I didn't know what was happening here...
...Hmpf.
I can't believe the impregnable Arrovina fell so quickly.
A lot of lives were killed in the raid that day before we could do anything.
If hell really existed, what happened here was a taste of it.
Are there more survivors?
Those who survived have evacuated to Black Fortress.
I stayed to secure their retreat.
That's why this place is empty.
I'm glad your people have survived.
They have. I don't know if my family is still alive, though.
If you're done talking, let me go.
If you're going to the Fortress, you're going in the same direction as we are.
I have more things to say to you. I hope you don't mind walking with us.
I wish we'd come sooner...
I'm sorry.
Don't say it if you don't mean it. I didn't expect help from the outside world,
especially from Elves.
What are you staring at?
I don't think the other races didn't help you because they didn't want to. They probably couldn't.
The whole continent is in shambles. Including my home, Elidora.
The Republic in Galluah is on the verge of collapse, and Ogria is destroyed as well.
Then why did you come to Arrovina instead of taking care of them?
You know better than anyone else that your kind and mine don't get along.
Like I said, we didn't come to fight.
Do you even know what's been happening lately?
An expedition force is being organized, with the Warrior of the Holy Sword as the commander, to defeat Angmund.
I don't care what happens outside my country.
You selfish mongrels.
We're cutting a path through monsters swarming all over the continent,
so Lorraine could join the expedition.
The only way to get to her destination is through Arrovina.
There's no way we can cross Galluah at this moment.
Well, the Elf princess really has a spiteful tongue.
Hmpf, that's because I'm dealing with you.
Stop! Enough!
Dark Elf, I sent a letter to Arrovina multiple times before we came.
To ask for your help establishing a defense line against monster invasion.
And they didn't respond.
I can't believe how quickly Arrovina fell.
The monsters could've thought Arrovina was up for grabs.
Having no allies, you must have looked vulnerable to them.
Or they did this to make use of the dark energy that the Dark Elves have.
Hmpf, we don't need help.
If it weren't for that raid, we wouldn't have gone down so quickly.
I'll return this humiliation tenfold.
Hmpf, you should take care of that terrible thing on your body first.
What is this thing that you've been talking about?
I want to yell at you for as long as I want, but there's something I have to do first.
Those filthy monsters still walk on the land Arrovina.
You... I don't think you're aware of your physical state.
Didn't you feel like you were sucked into something when you used your power? Don't you feel stronger than before?
Hm... Yes.
From now on, you should never—ever—fight.
What? Why are you telling me that all of a sudden?
The power you're using originates from the Evil Seed!
It's a formless mass of evil.
It's extremely rare, created only in a non-material environment.
I've seen only one other victim of it a long time ago.
What the hell are you trying to tell me?
Your right arm is infected by the Evil Seed.
Don't even think about using that power again.
You'd rather die than to suffer from the excruciating pain.
Explain this to me!
Watch your tone while talking to Lorraine!
I don't know who did this to you,
but it's really dangerous.
Gradually, the Evil Seed will take root and take over your body.
In other words, you're its host.
That bastard, that bastard did this to me!
Damn it! I'm going to cut this arm off!
It's invisible to its host,
and the harder you try to get rid of it, the deeper it'll hide.
It'll disappear every time it's threatened, wreaking havoc inside your body.
I've heard about it, but this is the first time I've actually seen it.
As far as I know, no ordinary entity can withstand it.
These Evil Seeds, unlike normal plants, grow in dark places.
Dark Elves abandoned light for the power of darkness; their bodies must have made perfect hosts for them.
Damn it—damn it!
The more the seed grows, the further it'll expand its influence inside the host.
You'll feel incredibly powerful, like you just did,
but that power is from your own energy
that the seed has consumed to feed itself.
The more you exhaust yourself, the quicker the Seed grows.
What happens if I leave the seed alone? Is it going to kill me?
Its roots will take hold of your heart, and once it's settled,
it'll devour you and produce a flower.
And that flower is the real problem.
The moment it opens, it'll generate a vortex powerful enough to suck the entire continent into it.
Worse still, the seed is extremely fertile.
Once it's fully grown, it can live without the host, spreading seeds everywhere it goes.
In other words, you could be a big obstacle to the elimination of Angmund.
That bastard, I can't believe he did this to me!
Well, but it's more likely you'll die before the seed blooms.
It's been said that no one survived the pain it causes during its growth.
The seed will die with you, having lost the vital energy to feed on.
Is that supposed to console me?
I'm sorry, but even I don't know how to get rid of the Evil Seed.
I don't think anyone except the high-rank Demons knows how to extract it.
Don't stimulate it. You must slow its growth for as long as you can.
After this expedition, I can go to Orvelia and ask the Gnomes for help. They're knowledgeable in all things.
Damn it, I don't need your help.
This is no time to stand on your pride!
Thank you for your concern, but I can take care of myself.
Well, we're not worried about you but about everyone else on earth.
Do you really have to pick apart everything I say?
Forget it. I don't want to argue.
We're close to the Fortress. We should split up.
No one here is going to welcome you.
You're really—
Go your own way.
I'm not going to repeat myself..
We were going to go with you to the Fortress.
If this is what you really want, then please deliver this letter to your king.
I've heard many bad things about you Dark Elves, but I don't believe you're a selfish race.
Or that you're traitors.
Hmpf.
You abandoned light for darkness, but you come from the same root as we do.
Is this letter all you want me to give to him?
Yes.
I hope you'll consider gathering survivors and helping us subjugate monsters.
We'll send you the reinforcements to help rebuild Arrovina.
This is the duty of the survivors.
I could care less about that duty you talk about, but I want to avenge my people.
Anyway, since you've deigned to come all the way here, I'll deliver your message to his majesty.
Please be careful.
And don't forget what I told you a while ago.
Better take good care of yourself. If you don't want to become a monster violet, that is.
Gah, I hope I'll never see you again!
That makes two of us.
I finally arrived in the Fortress, and thank the gods, Epigael was alive.
And we established a communication network with the other races, which helped rebuild Arrovina.
Years later, I heard both the Dark Lord and the Warrior had disappeared all of a sudden.
And then everything went back to normal.
Is this what they wanted?
I thought it was over.
I prayed that it was.
I'll be back.
Dimael, no.
Please don't leave me behind.
My deployment has been decided, Epigael.
They say the royal family will protect the families of those who have been drafted this time.
Also—never mind.
Dimael...
Reports say monsters have reappeared.
Epigael, decades ago, our parents were killed right before my eyes.
I'm not going to let the same tragedy happen to others in Arrovina.
I'm going for Arrovina. And for you.
But...
If something happens, go to Siel.
Now that he's one of the leaders of the army, he can't come to Aegina with me.
I'll come back. I promise.
Please don't go. Please!
Hmpf, there's just no end to them.
Captain, are you okay?
You've been looking pale.
And your arm...
Don't worry about me.
There are too many enemies!
C-Captain, they're coming from the Annes Hill as well!
What? But we cleared that area just a few days ago!
Is there another rift?
Ugh...
Have you requested Arrovina for reinforcements?
I've been sending messages, but I haven't heard back.
Damn it. Did something happen there?
They've been supporting us for over a decade. There's no reason to cut us off all of a sudden.
Captain, watch out!
I suggest we retreat and find how to get rid of the rift first!
If we stay here, we'll all get killed!
No! This is our last line of defense!
Without us, the enemy has a straight path to Arrovina!
This rumbling sensation from the deepest, lowest place inside me...
The seed keeps urging me.
How many years have I spent here, shedding blood?
Epigael...
I can lose myself anytime.
You're safer under the royal family's protection than you are with me.
Captain... We can't do this anymore.
Shut up! Did you forget that day?
If you don't want to see Arrovina get destroyed again, hold them off with your life!
Th-they're coming again.
We're doomed—doomed!
Just hang in there!
Reinforcements will be here soon from Arrovina!
It's over... The royal family abandoned us...
No, they didn't—they never will!
Don't give up! I promise, there will be help!
...? Waaaahhh!
Kyaaaak!
Damn it, there are enemies behind us, too!
Gather around the center!
Outta the way!
Captain, we really have to retreat now!
No!
*Chuckle* You rats.
There's nowhere you can run.
I can't wait to taste Dark Elf meat. Tee hee!
Let's retreat now, so we can have another chance!
Get off me!
Who should I eat first? Keh heh.
Captain, come on!
Shut up!
Urrggh...!
Captain?
No...! Not right now!
Please...!
The more the seed grows, the further it'll expand its influence inside the host.
You'll feel incredibly powerful,
but that power is from your own energy
that the seed has consumed to feed itself.
C-Captain!
I can't control my arm...!
Arrgh!
Get off me!
No... Stop... Not like this... Not yet...
Please... Please stop...
Please...
Ugh...
Captain! You're awake.
You went into a convulsion and lost consciousness.
Where am I...?
We couldn't help it.
We had to surrender to save ourselves.
Now we're prisoners... We're sorry.
I'm sorry I burdened you.
Not at all. I'm glad you're alive.
Are you okay? Your arm...
Don't worry about me.
I'm more worried about you.
I hit you. Are you okay?
I'm okay. Don't worry.
Thank the gods, you're still alive.
By the way, where are we?
I think they're taking us to Galluah, but what they're planning to do with us is beyond me.
What should we do now?
I don't have much time left. I can feel it in my bones.
What should I do now?
Epigael... I might not be able to keep my promise with you.
Keh heh. Nasty Dark Elves, look at you now!
They look tantalizing... Keh heh.
No, you idiot! He wants them alive this time.
I hate dealing with living sacrifices. They always struggle and don't stay still.
These ones came here on their own. I can't thank them enough. Keh heh heh.
Hungry... Hungry...
Soon you'll be the master's new art pieces.
Be thankful for that. Keh heh heh.
I don't know what you're yammering about,
but laugh while you can.
I'll make sure that you regret it.
You whelp, what are you chattering about?
I'm going to eat you. Keh heh.
Ah, you won't even have the time to feel any regret.
Because I'm going to kill you quickly.
Hm, he must have gone insane while he was locked up.
Stop talking like a coward.
You talk so much that my ears are ringing.
Alright, you must have a death wish.
I'll rip you apart and eat you right here and now. Keh heh.
I told you not to kill them, you idiot!
I got them.
It's now or never—run!
We're staying with you! We've lasted this long because of your leadership, Captain!
You saw it already. It's too dangerous for you to be with me!
I'll follow you soon.
Hurry up before more of them show up!
We're not leaving!
I'm not going to let the master's new test subjects go.
Damn it! Not again!
GO!
This is an order!
The only way to get out of here is to die. Mwa hah hah!
Captain, watch out!
Kyaaaak!
No!
Kyaaaak!
The sacrifices are everywhere.
It'll be a hassle, but we can just kill you and grab more!
Kyaaaak!
No... No!
You're alone now. I'll chew on you slowly. Keh heh heh.
Dimael...
Wh-what the... Why are you—kwaaaahhh!
Oh, you've reached your limits.
It's about to bloom.
It was worth following him, after all.
...Get out of my way.
No. You've got something I want.
Kwaaakkk!
He's lasted this long. He's not ordinary, that's for sure.
Ha ha, he's not bad.
Cocytus, you were right.
But for the bud to serve as the vessel for the Sealing Stone,
we can't just break off the flower. It has to be removed in its entirety.
If we don't pull it out at once, the seed will feel threatened and cut off its bud.
And he'll die before it blooms again.
We can't let that happen. No. It's too precious.
We need it to absorb the power of the rift in Dragia.
If we wait until it's fully grown, Malduk might beat us to it.
He'll try to use the Vortex of Evil.
We can't handle the vortex. It'll cause us trouble.
We only need the plant's infinite absorbing power.
What are you going to do?
It's so deeply rooted that it can't be pulled out at once.
We can let the plant go of this child instead.
A poison can only be neutralized by a stronger poison.
He'll never be able to get away from its hold unless he absorbs the deeper, thicker darkness.
So, you're going to use it.
Yes. When the energy stronger than the seed's enters his body,
intoxicates and loosens him,
after struggling against the seed, pull it out at once.
Hm... His body might not be able to withstand the toxicity.
Morrah, creatures like him don't die easily.
Even if he does, who cares? We just need the bud.
Hm, I have no use for this, anyway.
I've had brushes with death countless times,
and finally my time has come.
Maybe it's better I die than live in pain for the rest of my life...
But Epigael...
Finally, I'm free from that wench.
...? Where am I...?
I'm Heltanios, the keeper of the Ancient Spring of Life.
But you look just like me...!
*Chuckle* This is a spiritual space that I share with you.
I no longer have my body, so I've borrowed your form for the time being.
What's... going on?
A long time ago, a mysterious curse instantly dried up the spring,
and shattered my body.
The only thing I had left of my body were these eyes that see through everything.
For eternity, I've seen a great many warriors fight over me.
In the end, this witch won me.
But I have no intention of cooperating with her.
Besides, she has a companion that I'm not very uncomfortable with.
It must have been frustrating for them, not to know how to make use of me. Keh heh.
What are you talking about?
I don't want to hear you rant. Just scram!
*Chuckle* I like your face! And your eyes, too!
Finally, I've found the perfect home.
What are you doing?
Light is harmonious whereas darkness collides with those around it, binding them to it.
Embrace the new and unknown, like your ancestors.
Shut up. What you just said is an insult to my kind.
Stop bothering me! Leave me alone!
I can't.
*Huff, huff...*
You! I knew you were bluffing!
Mwa hah hah! Darkness overflows!
Finally... Finally!
I've been waiting for this so long.
A new body. A new home.
...!? What the hell!?
I'm your second eye, another shadow of yours.
Wh-what the...? Don't get close to me!
Kwaaahhh!!!
Urgh...
Whoa, he survived this, too.
Sheesh, that bastard must have taken a liking to you.
Wh-where...?
Ugh... Who are you?
Who am I? I'm your savior.
Looking for this? I'll make good use of it.
The Evil Seed will never grow again, all thanks to me.
But you might experience pain sometimes because of the damage that's already been done.
No...
You swine, what the hell did you do to me!?
How dare you speak to Maria like that!?
Enough, Morrah. This cute boy here is just worked up.
I saved you, and is this how you repay me?
Shut up. Anyone related to the Demons is my enemy!
I asked you! What did you do to my body!?
Hmpf, this is not what I expected when I saved your life.
Well, you don't have to know all the details.
Let's just say I did something amazing to you.
You're still breathing because of that thing I planted in you.
You! What are you up to!?
Stop running your mouth.
I can kill you right here and now.
I'd rather die than be humiliated like this!
You crooked, conniving scoundrels!
Oh, you speak with such charm.
Well, you gave me something I wanted, so I'll let it slide this time.
You... You only saved me to get that thing, didn't you?
If you thought I was going to thank you, forget it.
You've got what you want. Now scram!
YOU!
He survived that terrible pain.
He's not ordinary.
He can be pretty useful.
Hm, I'm telling you this because I find you cute,
but fighting in Aegina is not going to help your kind.
What?
Don't you know anything? You're so clueless.
You don't know what happened to Arrovina, do you? Tsk, tsk.
If you have family, you'd better go back now.
What are you trying to say!?
Well, nothing.
It's just that your royal family has sold itself out to the Dark Legion, risking its people's lives.
You're just in Aegina to die like a dog.
What? I don't...
Ha ha. Why don't you go see for yourself?
Whatever you're imagining, it's probably not as bad as reality.
Oh, so you do have family there.
Your face gives it away.
You scumbags, what the hell are you talking about?
I'm not going to believe what you say. I'll go see for myself!
Wait, hear me out first.
I feel that I deserve more than this flower.
I want something else for saving your life.
Well, it's not big.
If you see someone with the Holy Sword, follow him.
You can't just say whatever you want. Don't tell me what to do!
You'd better watch your mouth.
Don't be so difficult. I asked you a simple thing.
If you lied to me,
I'll find and kill you, whatever it takes.
Ho ho. So cute.
Morrah, I think he's going to be very useful to us.
I want you to follow him when we're done here.
Yes, Maria.
*Giggle* We need good pawns like him for our plan.
Epigael! Epigael!
Where are you?
Epigael!
She's not here.
She's not here!
Epigael! Where are you!?
Epigael, I'm sorry. I'll never leave you again.
Where are you? Please answer me, Epigael!
Have you heard? One of the royals that were thought to be wiped out has appeared.
The rumor also has it that King Temorel has disappeared.
This means we'll have a new king.
*Sigh* What good will that do? Nothing's going to change for us.
I keep seeing the sacrifices in my dreams.
We had to do it to survive, but still I don't feel right about that.
Hey, think about that day a hundred years ago.
Sometimes, small sacrifices are inevitable for the greater good.
I can't forget the look in their eyes as they were dragged away.
Why are you being so sentimental today?
It's not like we took anyone at random.
We only took those who had no family or friends.
If they could prove they had family, fake or not, we looked the other way, too.
Again...
Say that again.
Wh-what?
You bastards! Say that again!
I did not...
I did not fight in that hell hole to see this!
Kwaaaakkk!
Captain, we really have to retreat now!
Kurgh...
Captain, watch out!
H-help... K-kwaaakkk!
We've lasted this long because of your leadership, Captain!
Kwaaaakkk!
We're staying with you!
We're staying with you!
We're staying with you!
Please don't go. Please!
I'll come back. I promise.
You killed them! You did!
Arrrggghh!
K-kurrggh!
Kwaak!
Who picked the sacrifices?
Where's my sister?
W-we don't know! We only did what we were told!
Everyone keeps giving me the same answer.
Hah hah hah hah!
One of you'd better spill, or I'll destroy this whole place!
Who's there?
Siel!?
...! Dimael!
I thought you were dead.
How did you...?
Did you do this?
Siel, help me. I need your help.
My sister is safe, right?
I can't find Epigael, and I looked anywhere!
Tell me where she is. You know, don't you? Siel, you do, don't you?
Are you crazy? How could you do this to your comrades?
They're crazy!
Every single one of them is!
How could they sell out their own people?
Epigael is missing because of these scumbags!
Calm down and listen to me.
You want me to calm down. Would you calm down if you were me?
The royal family had no choice.
What? What are you talking about?
We're sorry that we couldn't send help to Aegina.
Siel, tell me where Epigael is. Where is my sister?
She's safe, right? She's with you, right?
We did our best as the leaders of the army!
We saved many people who were terrified of the Demon invaders.
Sacrifices were inevitable for peace!
What? Siel, did you...? No way...
You can't do this to me.. You just can't...
No way.. I can't believe this...
I did it for the greater good—for the country.
For the greater good? Hah, hah hah!
Hah hah hah! Did you also sell out my sister for the greater good?
Dimael, of all people, you must understand me.
Remember the sea of blood that covered Arrovina a hundred years ago.
Just answer my question! Where the hell is Epigael!?
...I'm sorry about what happened to her.
I couldn't help it.
You... How...? How could you...!?
